divs: Sighting Detailsme and my son were out playing catch about 5pm and for some reason i looked up and seen this thing up in the sky at first i thought i was a balloon but after seiing it for a while i realized that it couldnt be a balloon it just sat there suspended up in the sky without moving it seemed to change shape at times after a while it started moving south real slow then faster and faster until i lost sight of it.
Summary: i was playing catch with son and this object
Object Shape: Circle, Cylinder, Disc, Sphere, Square, Rectagular
trends: There have been 417 other sightings in Phoenix
There was one other sighting in Phoenix on or around March 15th 2010
This sighting has never been favorited.
